hero.headline: Crafting Personal & Family Web Experiences
hero.description: I design and build custom digital spaces to help individuals and families preserve memories and manage their digital lives with ease.

footer.aboutText: Developer and designer creating personalized web applications ‚Äî from family tools to finance dashboards ‚Äî focused on clarity, connection, and long-term value.

unifiedLife.title: UnifiedLife Hub
unifiedLife.desc: A centralized dashboard for managing travel, documents, finance, and memories.
unifiedLife.fullDescription: UnifiedLife Hub is a comprehensive personal dashboard designed to bring together essential life data. It includes modules for travel history, document management, income/expense tracking, memory storage, and residential history ‚Äî all in one secure space.
features: Interactive travel logger with stats and filters
Finance tracker with recurring entry logic and CSV export
Memory vault for images and videos
Residence history timeline and current location summary

financeTracker.title: Smart Finance Tracker
financeTracker.desc: Track income, expenses, and visualize your financial journey.
financeTracker.fullDescription: Smart Finance Tracker helps individuals and families manage income and spending with clarity. It includes recurring logic, charts, file uploads, and CSV export to give you complete control over your financial story.
features: Income and expense logging with categories
File upload for receipts or notes

legacyVault.title: Legacy Vault
legacyVault.desc: Preserve stories, messages, and memories for future generations.
legacyVault.fullDescription: Legacy Vault is a memory preservation app that allows users to store personal audio, video, and written messages. It's a digital time capsule ‚Äî ideal for sharing wisdom, love, and history across generations.
features: Secure and private access per user
Support for tagging and categorizing memories

assetManager.title: Asset Manager
assetManager.desc: Track and visualize family wealth and property ownership.
assetManager.fullDescription: Asset Manager is a visual finance tool that helps track assets, inheritance, and property. Designed for transparency and long-term planning, it includes upload support, charts, and family member categorization.
features: Charts showing value by year or type

milestoneTracker.title: Milestone Tracker
milestoneTracker.desc: Document and showcase educational and career achievements.
milestoneTracker.fullDescription: Milestone Tracker allows users to document education and career growth. From certificates to job changes, it captures life‚Äôs progress with visual filters and timeline displays.
features: Tag milestones by education level or field
Visual filters by role or phase

familyTree.title: Family Tree Viewer
familyTree.desc: Map family relationships visually with profile-linked data.
familyTree.fullDescription: Family Tree Viewer is an interactive tool for visualizing family connections. It renders relationships dynamically with photos, types, and click-to-view profiles for deep exploration.
features: Dynamic tree layout using graph libraries
Designed for personal and extended family use

cloudDashboard.title: Private Cloud Dashboard
cloudDashboard.desc: Lightweight file storage system for private groups or families.
cloudDashboard.fullDescription: Private Cloud Dashboard offers a secure and minimal file-sharing platform for families or teams. With Firebase support, tagging, and search filters, it‚Äôs easy to store and access files privately.
features: Upload files with category and tags

about.intro1: I'm Abel Nerea ‚Äî a creative developer and designer based in Poland. I blend logic and aesthetics to deliver impactful web solutions.
about.intro2: From personal family apps to client portfolios, I specialize in React, Firebase, and Tailwind CSS. I value clean code, responsive design, and purposeful user experience.
about.drivesMeText: I believe technology is best when it brings people together. Whether it's preserving memories through apps or solving workflow problems, I approach each project with empathy, curiosity, and a desire to simplify lives.
about.edu: 2023 - MSc in Computer Engineering, Vistula University
about.eduDesc: Graduated with a strong focus on full-stack development and data-driven projects.
about.a1qaDesc: Built and ran automation scripts using Selenium and GitHub for collaborative testing.
about.testronicDesc: Performed exploratory and scripted tests, logged bugs using Jira.
about.testimonial1: "Abel consistently delivered clean, efficient solutions and contributed to better workflows with his curiosity and team spirit." ‚Äî Mentor at A1QA
about.testimonial2: "His ability to translate abstract ideas into working, user-friendly interfaces is top-notch." ‚Äî Former Project Collaborator

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.description: Whether it's for collaboration, freelancing, or just to say hi ‚Äî I'm always open to connecting.

punchCard.desc: Custom digital punch card system for restaurants or coffee shops, with customer tracking and analytics.

multiPage.title: Multi-Page Business Website
multiPage.desc: Responsive website with multiple pages built using React or Next.js.

portfolio.title: Portfolio Website
portfolio.desc: Custom portfolio to showcase your projects, skills, and resume with animations and SEO.

ecommerce.title: E-commerce Storefront
ecommerce.desc: Complete online store with product pages, cart, and payment integration.

restaurantMenu.title: Restaurant Menu + Ordering System
restaurantMenu.desc: Interactive food menu and basic online ordering system for takeaway or delivery.

firebaseSetup.title: Firebase App Setup
firebaseSetup.desc: Authentication, Firestore database, and hosting for web apps.

adminDashboard.title: Admin Dashboard / Web App Panel
adminDashboard.desc: Functional dashboard with charts, access control, and filtering tools.

pwaOptimization.title: Mobile Optimization + PWA
pwaOptimization.desc: Make your web app installable and mobile-first for better user experience.

seoSetup.title: SEO + Meta Tags Setup
seoSetup.desc: Improve Google indexing and social media preview visibility.

maintenance.title: Monthly Maintenance
maintenance.desc: Ongoing bug fixes and content updates. Up to 5 small tasks/month.

customFeature.title: Custom Feature Development
customFeature.desc: Request a feature like booking, search filters, or animations.

pricing.subtitle: Freelance services tailored for businesses and creatives.

delivery.a: 1‚Äì2 weeks depending on the project scope.

hosting.a: Yes, a domain + hosting is required, but I can help you set it up.

revisions.q: Can I request changes after delivery?
revisions.a: Absolutely ‚Äî I offer revisions until you're satisfied.
